name: Toy Derby
description:
= THIS IS A PROTOTYPE, BEWARE OF BUGS =

Toy Derby is a vehicular combat game with local multiplayer for up to 4 players. Inspired by games such as Twisted Metal and Vigilante 8, Toy Derby puts you behind the wheel of your favorite toy car and let's you equip it with weapons to destroy your foes.

The game currently features:

  • 4 vehicles to choose from: Bus, Van, Truck or Wooden Car
  • 6 different weapons to equip: a Cereal Shotgun! a Candy Gatling! A... Spork Hook?? 
  • 2 maps: the Room or the Bathroom? So many choices... so much to blow up!

When you weaponize your toys, mayhem ensues.

CONTROLS (supports Gamepad):

  • W / RT - Accelerate
  • S / LT - Brake
  • A and D / Left Stick - Steer
  • MBL / LS - Fire Weapon (Left)
  • MBR / RS - Fire Weapon (Right)
  • Q / X - Switch Weapon (Left)
  • E / B - Switch Weapon (Right)
  • LShift / Y - Boost
